participant_abstract.sent: Each person gave a presentation on what he was researching previously, new findings, opinions and preferences were voiced.
Tasks were set for each person to work on for the next meeting.

participant_actions.sent: Determine costs of led, speaker and transmitter for adding to the remote, materials and design of remote

participant_decisions.sent: Remote only to be used for TV, no other appliances .
Possible Led and speaker for finding lost remote.
Possible collaboration to win over the market i.e. with a tv or electronics company.

participant_problems.sent: That we're restricted to remote only for TV. only using a joypad and numbers makes the need for some more buttons.
